Welcome to Vero Beach's
Premier Seasonal Performance Venue
The Emerson Center's mission is to provide educational, enlightening, and thought-provoking programs, as well as memorable musical events, for our community.
Icon by Linea (http://linea.io)
Icon by Linea (http://linea.io)
dynamic header end
e-mail sign-up
Subscribe to Emerson E-Mails
Stay informed about our upcoming shows, lectures, and events.
Our Patrons Enjoy
Icon by Font Awesome (https://fontawesome.com)
Musical Entertainment
MusicWorks connects classic rock and folk artists with audiences who appreciate the music of the ’70s, ’80s, and ’90s.  MusicWorks has been bringing artists and music lovers together for over a decade.
Learn More
Icon by Font Awesome (https://fontawesome.com)
Educational Lectures
The Emerson E-Series welcomes local, national, and international speakers to present their research on contemporary and popular subjects.
New season to be announced
in Fall 2025
Icon by Font Awesome (https://fontawesome.com)
Symphony Concerts
Under the vision and leadership of Aaron Collins, the Space Coast Symphony Orchestra reflects all that makes Central Florida special: its creativity, spirit, beauty and quest for knowledge.
learn more
Icon by Icons8 Line Awesome (https://icons8.com/line-awesome)
Local Venue Rental
Whether you are hosting a benefit event, a fundraisers, or a conference, the Emerson Center can accommodate your rental needs.
learn more
Icon by Icons8 Line Awesome (https://icons8.com/line-awesome)
Art Gallery
Art at the Emerson Gallery embraces artists of all mediums, providing a platform to showcase their artistic talents through a diverse array of exhibitions.
learn more
Icon by Font Awesome (https://fontawesome.com)
Fair Trade Store
The Fair Trade Corner, situated on the Emerson Center campus, serves as a gift shop specializing in organic and fair trade products. It operates before most performances throughout the season.
learn more

1590 27th Avenue. Vero Beach, FL 32960
The Emerson Center is located on the campus of the Unitarian Universalist Fellowship of Vero Beach.

The Emerson Box Office
The Emerson Center Box Office is currently closed for the season and will reopen in Fall 2025.
For the most up-to-date information on upcoming events, we encourage you to join our email list. Stay connected and be
                      the first to know when tickets go on sale!
